column4: Does anyone know why whenever I try to start Jack Audio it says 14:59:25.270 Post-shutdown script terminated with exit status=256. ?
are you using the RT kernel?
if you do a uname -a and it tells you you are on the generic kernel, try disabling real time in jacks preferences.  this may cause latency issues depending on what you are doing...
I disabled the real time and it still doesn't work
